scripts.dev: yarn install:all && yarn build:client && yarn server:dev
scripts.build: yarn install:all && yarn install:language-servers && yarn --cwd server migrate && yarn build:client
scripts.build:prod: yarn install:all && yarn install:language-servers && yarn --cwd server migrate:prod && yarn build:client
scripts.install:all: yarn install && yarn --cwd client install && yarn --cwd server install
scripts.install:language-servers: yarn --cwd server install && cd server && node ../language-servers/install.js
